resources.string: You must add at least one item
The ingredient can not contain numbers
The ingredient can not contain metacharacter
Can not add an empty ingredient :(
Ops! we don\'t find any recipe with this options :(
Search through hundreds of thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking.
\nThis app was developed for the unit Software Engineering Laboratory (2016.2) which is part of the course Computer Science at Universidade Federal de Campina Grande (UFCG).\n
There are below some information about the people involved:\n

Caynan Victor Landim Sousa
Jair Guedes Ferreira Neto
Luiza Carvalho Silveira
 Martha Michelly Galv√£o Menezes
Rafaelle Amorim Monteiro Xavier
Samir Silva de Medeiros
\nIn the \'Sideview menu\' you can see the following menu items: Select Ingredients, Favorites, Tutorial and About.

In the \'Select Ingredients\' menu item you can add ingredients should/must be contained in the recipe. Add an ingredient per line. There are three filter types: recipe type, cuisine and diet. You can use them to search for specific recipes.

In the \'Select Recipe Type\' item you can select types of the recipes. The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

In the \'Select Cuisine\' item you can select the cuisine(s) of the recipes. One or more of the following: african, chinese, japanese, korean, vietnamese, thai, indian, british, irish, french, italian, mexican, spanish, middle eastern, jewish, american, cajun, southern, greek, german, nordic, eastern european, caribbean, or latin american.
In the \'Select Diet\' item you can choose the diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.
Once you have selected all the filters, click on the \'Search\' button to search the recipes.
After that, we will receive some recipes containing the desired ingredients according to the chosen filters.
In the \'Result\' screen click on some recipe to see its details: description, ingredients and preparation.

In the \'Select Ingredients\' menu item you can add ingredients should/must be contained in the recipe. Add an ingredient per line. If you want select all filters you must click on \'Check All\' button. To clear the selected filter you can uncheck one by one or click on \'Uncheck All\' button. Once you have selected all the filters, click on the \'Next\' button to select the ingredients.
\nIn the \'Sideview menu\' you can choose which types of recipes you want to consult: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.
